title: Sindh’ govt should focus on SOP’s implementation to control COVID spread: Hammad
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 31 (APP):Minister for Energy Hammad Azhar on Saturday said the Sindh government should focus on SOP’s implementation and targeted interventions in high risk settings to control the COVID spread in Karachi.
A blanket lockdown in the economic heart of Pakistan would endanger livelihoods of millions, he tweeted.
The Sindh government should focus on SOP's implementation and targeted interventions in high risk settings to control the covid spread in Karachi. A blanket lockdown in the economic heart of Pakistan will endanger livelihoods of millions.
— Hammad Azhar (@Hammad_Azhar) July 31, 2021
